description: Registry of executable agent protocols for development tasks

AGT-002.title: Code Audit Protocol
AGT-002.description: Validates that the codebase correctly implements documented rules.

AGT-003.title: Rule Audit Protocol
AGT-003.description: Validates rule files for structural integrity, consistency, and coverage.

AGT-004.title: Dynamic Code Audit Protocol
AGT-004.description: Dynamically validates the codebase against active rules in /rules. Detects orphan folders, implementation drift, and anti-patterns.

audit.description: Audit protocols for validating rules and code

AGT-001.title: n8n Development Workflow
AGT-001.reason: Workflow methodology belongs in persona as 'Operating Protocol', not standalone agent

PER-001.title: n8n Architect Persona
PER-001.reason: Personas are philosophy/mindset docs, not executable protocols

INT-006.reason: Workflow specs belong in integration rules
